Celestia is the First Modular Blockchain.message: Celestia is the First Modular Blockchain network which enables developers to deploy their own blockchain as easy as deploying a new smart contract.

Celestia allows you to run a validator n.message: Celestia allows you to run a validator node, a bridge node or a light client to be able to support the network.

Celestia introduces what is called the D.message: Celestia introduces what is called the Data Availability Layer for enabling efficient scaling and allowing L2 Rollups to do data sampling for transactions they need.
